item.title: End NV-164 East at US-95
item.description: End NV-164 East at US-95 in Searchlight. Turn right for US-95 south to Needles (CA); left for US-95 north to Las Vegas. Continue straight for Cottonwood Cove Road to Cottonwood Cove.

item.title: NV-164 West - Clark County
item.description: NV-164 west in Clark County. NV-164 between Searchlight and the California state line passes through a large Joshua Tree forest.

item.title: NV-164 West - Walking Box Ranch Road
item.description: NV-164 West at Walking Box Ranch Road

item.title: US-95 South at NV-164 West
item.description: US-95 South at NV-164 West to Nipton (California). Continue south on US-95 for Needles (California).

item.title: US-95 South Approaching NV-164
item.description: US-95 South approaching NV-164 in Searchlight.
